description:
BREAKING CHANGE: remove bower.json and component.json: 
This is only breaking if you are currently using bower as the package manager for inflection@1.x. Inflection is from version 2.0.0 no longer being distributed using Bower, hence you would have to use something like npm or yarn if you want future inflection updates. For a guide on how to migrate away from Bower to using yarn see: https://bower.io/blog/2017/how-to-migrate-away-from-bower/
We ship types with this package, so you don't need the @types/inflection package anymore. This is not breaking, we are just informing you that importing the types separate is no longer necessary.
BREAKING CHANGE: increase node minimal version to 14.0. You need to use Node >=14.0.0 if you want to use Inflection 2.x
BREAKING CHANGE: inflect does not parse strings as count anymore
